title: Drawing, "Thermometer", ca. 1820
medium: pen and brown ink, brush and  brown wash over graphite on cream wover paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Scale showing circular hole at the place of bulb. Three putti carry tablets, signs of Zodiac, Lion, Cancer, Capricorn, respectively. In background, clouds and rays. Verso: part of arch with same three signs, sketched in graphite.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Thermometer", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. pen and brown ink, brush and  brown wash over graphite on cream wover paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1514.
